body_html:
I have similar issue, can't figure out still what's happening.

Code:

import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session()
with tf.device('/gpu:0'):
    node = tf.constant(3.0)
print(sess.run(node))

Environment:
Windows 10
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX TITAN X
CUDA: 8.0
CUDNN: 5
Python 3.5.2
TensorFlow-GPU 1.0.1

cudaRuntimeGetVersion returns 8000;
cudaDriverGetVersion returns 8000;

body_text:
I have similar issue, can't figure out still what's happening.
Code:

sess = tf.Session()

    node = tf.constant(3.0)
print(sess.run(node))

body:
I have similar issue, can't figure out still what's happening.

Code:
```python
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session()
with tf.device('/gpu:0'):
    node = tf.constant(3.0)
print(sess.run(node))
```

Environment:
Windows 10
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX TITAN X
CUDA: 8.0
CUDNN: 5
Python 3.5.2
TensorFlow-GPU 1.0.1

```cudaRuntimeGetVersion``` returns 8000;
```cudaDriverGetVersion``` returns 8000;
